name: Inevitability
description: "It is inevitable that man will one day live among the stars" Inevitability is a game where you can build a space empire! Collect materials to craft parts and build your very own fleet of starships and stations block by block. Manage relations with eight factions spanning four alien races.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This is a great game! I wish the ship could turn using something other than the mouse ,like q and e but that is all i have to say. Just an overall amazing game.

this game is put together in a very strange way, i like the part that you can mine a planet but apart from that the control is unfriendly, there is no information about different ship module in the game, some of the MUSIC in this game is horrifically composed that kills the mood instantly, feels like playing a game that is about cowboy chasing rabbit. the art style is simple and interesting that reminds me ascII games.

Uhhh.. its a really good game. but. Its then nothing. if you get blue beamer. and find the big pirate ship and you can shoot it inside it. and then you got a so much parts. But its really good game. ill give it 7/10 good music. good gameplay. and its so good.
